abstract: I've never really paid the sort of attention I suppose I should have to arguments about Shakespeare's identity.
snippet: I've never really paid the sort of attention I suppose I should have to arguments about Shakespeare's identity.
lead_paragraph: May I make a confession? And I realize that this may be regarded as a heresy by the members of my tribe, by which I mean those of us who were and always shall be nerdy English majors.

headline.main: Theater Talkback: Who Wrote Shakespeare? Who Cares?
